long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube H264ify is a Chrome extension that makes your YouTube video playback smoother! ğŸ¬

ğŸ”¹ By default, YouTube streams videos in VP8/VP9 encoding, which can cause high CPU usage, stuttering, or even make your device overheat. H264ify helps switch the video stream to the more commonly hardware-accelerated H.264, resulting in smoother playback, reduced CPU usage, and extended battery life. ğŸ“ˆ

ğŸ’¡ Features:

Automatically switches YouTube video streams to H.264 to reduce CPU usage
Enhances video playback smoothness and minimizes stuttering
Lowers battery consumption on laptops and mobile devices
Experience a smoother YouTube journey with YouTube H264ify! ğŸš€
